column1: From my family to yours Happy Thanksgiving. #Thanksgiving2020 https://t.co/Hwr2gwsMPM
Today we honor all of the veterans across our great nation. Thank you for your bravery and service. #VeteransDay https://t.co/9qVmXns8Gj

THANK YOU #MO02! I’m humbled and honored to once again represent you in Congress. I promise to continue fighting for our conservative Missouri values and always putting Missourians first and politics second. https://t.co/J3uozoOjEH

I’m so incredibly grateful to all of my volunteers and family. None of this would have been possible without their support. With their help we’re going to win this fight and protect our conservative mid-western values! https://t.co/vP9yheL4d3
There is only ONE HOUR left to vote. If you are in line before 7 PM you can still vote! Find your polling location and make sure your voice is heard: https://t.co/dRQ7g1QyzE https://t.co/2lCGLabKvo

I’ve been to every corner of our district today! We’re fighting to ensure that your Constitutional rights and freedoms are always protected.   Make sure you get in line and vote.  The polls are open until 7 PM! https://t.co/US9H7s8t7e
There are just 2 hours until the polls close. Find your polling location and go vote to ensure that we are defending the American Dream and protecting our conservative values. https://t.co/LRWXVuOQKp
I’m so grateful to have the support of the St. Charles Sheriff. I promise to always support our brave men and women in uniform. If you agree then I need your support. Go vote! https://t.co/fXew416wUe
Little Raymond got to go with his Mom to the polls today for the first time! Cast your vote before 7 PM. https://t.co/RLMMnGm6gs

There are only 5 hours left to vote! The Democrats have done everything in their power to flip this seat. Cast your vote before 7 PM to help us ensure we protect our conservative Missouri values. https://t.co/2vXRjJGkfF
Have you voted yet? The polls are open until 7 PM. Be sure to stay in line and cast your vote to ensure your voice is heard. https://t.co/oUSxEOBQYa

If you are planning to submit an absentee ballot it needs to be at your local election office BEFORE 7 PM. If a ballot is received after 7 PM it will NOT be counted. You can also surrender your ballot at the polls & vote in person. https://t.co/AKvcNNYR40

🚨THE POLLS ARE OFFICIALLY OPEN🚨  The polls will be open from now until 7 PM tonight. If you’re headed to the polls make sure to bring an ID and wear a mask. Find your polling location here: https://t.co/dRQ7g1yXI6 https://t.co/rSzOUOD9K9

I can’t thank our volunteers &  supporters enough. Team Wagner reached hundreds of thousands of voters in #MO02 this campaign &  we are grateful for each &  every one of you.  Tomorrow is Election Day & polls open at 6AM sharp. Make sure you get out vote and bring your friends! https://t.co/kMnvSo3X1J

Thank you to all of our volunteers and supporters who came out for our Super Sunday today!  We reached over 50000 voters today and Team Wagner is ready to reach even more as we close out this election.  Watch our latest ad for a reminder of what we are fighting for in #MO02. https://t.co/gCpRld5KIn
Thank you to Mark Woolbright and @PFEM2665 IAFF Team Wagner volunteers for lit dropping today and helping get the word out.    #MO02 https://t.co/GY08bq7AiR

We knocked some more doors in Oakville where we gave out some Team Wagner yard signs.  3 days left and our campaign continues to reach more supporters.  If you want to help out in the home stretch click here. https://t.co/JDXRhIgAal https://t.co/LwdnemiACQ
Nothing better than good BBQ in South County between door knocks on the campaign trail. A rack of ribs beats broccoli as a snack any day. #MO02 https://t.co/BMdyuwGAQx
It’s a great day to door knock and get out the vote! #MO02 https://t.co/qotnJdfIDO

Thank you to my friend Sarah Huckabee Sanders for helping us get out the vote with Governor Parson and our local elected officials today in St. Charles!  There are just 3 days left until Tuesday’s election so make sure you get out and vote! https://t.co/ygIPTfvxHe

Every single one of us is working all day every day to make sure we bring home a victory. Thank you for your support and if you want to volunteer during the last 6 days click here: https://t.co/gxwwFJRfYF

I joined Governor Parson Attorney General Schmitt Ann Dorn and local elected officials during the Governor's bus tour in St. Charles and Jefferson Counties yesterday for get out the vote rallies. https://t.co/o8NC7E4qsH
Want a yard sign?    Click this link to have one delivered to your house: https://t.co/6bj9IAAY0c #MO02 https://t.co/rpVCOmiZ7Y

I am proud to serve you and your family and be a voice for the vulnerable.  Life is not about left or right but right or wrong.  I am asking you to join me in seeing the good in our world together as one nation.  #MO02 https://t.co/oNMJ0LgfRg

I have worked to ensure coverage for those with preexisting conditions and I have voted to protect that essential coverage 4 times.     Watch our new ad on my work to protect those with preexisting conditions and why this issue is personal for me.    #MO02 https://t.co/PIdcWKlx51
Just 14 days until the election sign up to volunteer with Team Wagner here: https://t.co/gxwwFJRfYF #MO02

Grateful to join pro-life advocates at the Respect Life Convention with the Archdiocese of St. Louis. Life is so precious and I appreciate their work fighting for the unborn and being a voice for the voiceless.  #MO02 https://t.co/VuPkRk2GPX

We just got a new shipment of yard signs this morning! There is still plenty of time to get a yard sign to show your support. Click this link to have one delivered to your house: https://t.co/6bj9IAAY0c https://t.co/WyxsxhxR7S

I’ll be joining @STLRegChamber for their candidate forum in about half an hour. The link to register is below. I hope you are able to join! https://t.co/XAWjHvnVa8

Thank you to everyone who came to our Super Saturday Door Knock today!  We have just 17 days until the election and this campaign is a team effort through to the end.  If you want to join us and volunteer click here: https://t.co/gxwwFJRfYF https://t.co/VzR1e6bVDx

My opponent Jill Schupp and her dark money DC supporters are intentionally misleading voters about my record.   The facts are clear: I have never taken a pay raise and I actually voted against pay raises 6 times.  Watch my recent ad here and see the truth about my record. https://t.co/3xXf0iay2S
So honored that the more than 22000 individual donors to my campaign this cycle have enabled us to raise $1.4 million in Q3!  Momentum is on our side and onward to victory!
I spoke to @jrosenbaum on @stlpublicradio about this year's election the latest news on a coronavirus relief package in Congress and more.  Listen to the interview here.  https://t.co/3xOHDhrjTS

Only 20 days until Election Day but there is still plenty of time to get involved.    Sign up here for a yard sign: https://t.co/6bj9IAAY0c  Sign up here to volunteer to contact your neighbors: https://t.co/gxwwFJRfYF

My opponent Jill Schupp has never in her time in the state legislature passed a bill that she has authored. In contrast bills that I have authored have been signed into law by both President Obama and President Trump.

Jill Schupp is supported by radical groups that want to defund our police. She has even voted against 5 public safety budgets during her time in the state legislature. Our police need to keep our communities safe we should be supporting them not defunding them. https://t.co/pk3OeYAK0T

My opponent Jill Schupp is for Medicare for All she even introduced a bill supporting it twice. Medicare for All would be devastating to the healthcare of #MO02 and would cause nearly 90% to lose the coverage they currently have.

During her 20 year career in government Jill Schupp has voted time after time to raise income taxes gas taxes and sales taxes. She even supported a 21% property tax increase when she was on the school board. Now is the time to ease the tax burden not increase it. #Fox2Forum

This District is so very personal to me.  It's where I was born and raised it's where I raised my family.  It's where we've worked where we've volunteered where we worship and I will tell you that working on behalf of my constituents is the absolute privilege of a lifetime. https://t.co/ZlqtUvIpno
I want to set the record straight here I absolutely support protecting coverage of preexisting conditions.  I voted 4 times to make sure that coverage is preserved. https://t.co/49jUuM6364

I had the privilege and honor to vote for 4 different bipartisan COVID relief packages to help our businesses our families the economy our healthcare providers our schools and our state and local jurisdictions. https://t.co/7zINqHe4mm

Tune in on @Fox2now for the #MO02 Congressional forum so you can hear directly from me about how I am working for you on issues like coverage of preexisting conditions public health and safety and the federal response to the pandemic. https://t.co/dPRDaJZ4Nv

...and keeping our communities safe during this pandemic.  Rest assured I have always felt it important to go out and show up whether in person or digitally directly to the people of Missouri's 2nd District so I can better represent you on the issues you find most important. https://t.co/lcQQ6OhQzB

Thank you to the Fenton Chamber of Commerce for the opportunity to speak at an open forum w/ them so I could detail my strong record of fighting to ensure coverage of preexisting conditions working to get our economy & our schools open safely...

G'mar Chatima Tovah to all those observing Yom Kippur today. https://t.co/7sOIn4HB0c

I'll always support those who protect our communities and keep us safe. Now is the time to stand with our police and firefighters as they do their jobs. I'll always have their backs just like they have ours.

I am proud to have the support of our fearless local firefighters (@PFEM2665) our brave St. Louis County police officers (@SLCPA_FOP) and our valiant law enforcement officers from around the state (@MissouriFOP). Check out my new ad highlighting their endorsements. https://t.co/QV2ilc1YrH
